statements: SELECT * FROM hotel_bookings WHERE booking_id = 1;
SELECT guest_name, room_number FROM hotel_bookings WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT * FROM hotel_bookings WHERE guest_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date FROM hotel_bookings WHERE check_out_date > '2021-09-30';
SELECT booking_id, guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM hotel_bookings WHERE room_number > 100;
SELECT * FROM hotel_bookings WHERE guest_name = 'Alice';
SELECT guest_name, room_number FROM hotel_bookings WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01' AND check_out_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT booking_id, room_number, guest_name FROM hotel_bookings WHERE booking_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM hotel_bookings WHERE room_number = 101 ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT guest_name, count(*) AS total_bookings FROM hotel_bookings GROUP BY guest_name HAVING count(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_bookings DESC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings WHERE booking_id = 10;
SELECT booking_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings WHERE room_number = 201 AND check_in_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM availability WHERE available_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT room_number, available_date FROM availability WHERE room_number = 301 ORDER BY available_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE room_number = 101 ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT booking_id, room_number, check_in_date FROM bookings WHERE check_in_date > '2022-01-01' AND check_in_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT room_number FROM availability WHERE available_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT booking_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings WHERE room_number = 102 AND check_out_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY check_out_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_bookings, room_number FROM bookings GROUP BY room_number HAVING total_bookings > 5 ORDER BY total_bookings DESC;
SELECT * FROM bookings
SELECT guest_name, room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings WHERE booking_id = 1
SELECT room_type, rate FROM rooms WHERE capacity >= 4 ORDER BY rate DESC
SELECT room_number, capacity FROM rooms WHERE rate < 100.00 ORDER BY room_number ASC
SELECT booking_id, guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings WHERE room_id = 2 AND check_in_date >= '2022-10-01'
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE room_id = 101 ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings WHERE room_id = 102 AND check_in_date >= '2022-01-01' AND check_out_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT room_id, room_number, capacity FROM rooms WHERE room_type = 'Suite' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT room_id, room_type, rate FROM rooms WHERE rate < 200.00 AND capacity > 2 ORDER BY rate ASC;
SELECT availability_id, room_id, available_date FROM availability WHERE available_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT room_id, guest_name FROM bookings WHERE check_in_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT booking_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings WHERE guest_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT room_number, room_type, price FROM rooms ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT guest_name, phone_number, email FROM guests WHERE guest_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE room_id = 101;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings WHERE check_in_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-15';
SELECT room_id, room_number, room_type, price FROM rooms WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT guest_name, phone_number, email FROM guests WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT b.*, r.room_number, r.room_type, g.guest_name FROM bookings b JOIN rooms r ON b.room_id = r.room_id JOIN guests g ON b.guest_name = g.guest_name;
SELECT * FROM guests;
SELECT booking_id, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM hotel_room_bookings WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT guest_name, email, phone_number, country FROM guests WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT room_number, available, price FROM room_availability WHERE available = true;
SELECT room_type_name, description FROM room_types ORDER BY room_type_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM guests WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT guest_name, email, phone_number FROM guests WHERE country = 'Canada';
SELECT booking_id, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM hotel_room_bookings WHERE room_number = 101 ORDER BY booking_id DESC;
SELECT room_number, price FROM room_availability WHERE available = true AND price > 100 ORDER BY room_number ASC;
SELECT room_type_name, description FROM room_types WHERE room_type_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY room_type_name;
